body.p: This document outlines how this project database was created.

section.title: Setup
section.p: Check everything is running OK - http://localhost:8888

section.title: Local DOAP Files
section.p: Since we intend to store some of our DOAP files locally we will need to configure Forrest to find them.
Create a project DOAP directory. For example mkdir rdf
Add a DOAP file to this directory. For example foo.xml

Add an entry to the locationmap.xml so that Forrest can find this DOAP file. For example:
<match pattern="project.descriptor.*"> <location src="{properties:content}/xdocs/rdf/{1}.xml"/> </match>
Restart Forrest (required as we edited the locationmap)

section.title: Remote DOAP files
section.p: DOAP files may be retrieved from remote locations.

Add an entry to the locationmap for the project in question. For example:
<match pattern="project.descriptor.forrest"> <location src="http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/forrest/trunk/site-author/content/doap.xml"/> </match>
Restart Forrest (required as we edited the locationmap)
